price: ߥߟߊ߫ ߡߊ߲߬ߛߊ߬ߦߊ ߘߏ߫ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߟߏ߫ ߓߊ߬߸ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߬ ߛߐ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߝߟߏ߬ ߖߟߎ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߢߐ߲߰ ߠߊ߫ ( ߖߘߍ߬ߕߊ ߡߊ߬ )
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ فَإِذٗا لَّا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: am lahum naṣībun mina al-mul'ki fa-idhan lā yu'tūna al-nāsa naqīran
translations: (even as much as the) speck on a date seed
